name: Chrono Gnome: The Time Traveling Master Gardener
name_original: Chrono Gnome: The Time Traveling Master Gardener
description:
A puzzle platformer where you can travel between past and present timelines to help a little girl recreate the fabled garden of her grandmother. 

Created between 7/15/19 - 7/22/19 as part of PIGSquad's July Summer Slow Jam.

Producer, story/dialog : Sarah Sands

Art/Animation : Matthias Wheelhouse (@mattiwheels), Ben Wheelhouse 

Title/dialog design : Calvin Ross Carl (calvinrosscarl.com)

Programming : Johnny Viel, Jacob Penner, Lauren Tarczynski

Level Design: Johnny Viel

Music : Kevin Nagel
